attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wandsworth Council plan to develop the Tooting Bec Triangle area of Tooting Common, this area is enjoyed by thousands of local residents as it is one of a few pieces of green land in South London which is enclosed completely by trees and provides a quiet haven from the outside world.  Wandsworth plan to build an alarming 10 football pitches on this ground which would also mean the destruction of Waldorf School. The common is recognised as being a Site of Metropolitan importance for Greater London because it includes a number of rare wildlife habitats.
